body_content.explanation: believing or showing an unreasonable belief that your own country or race is the best or most important:
examples: The crowd was enthusiastically singing chauvinistic patriotic songs.

body_content.explanation: believing that or behaving as if women are naturally less important, intelligent, or able than men:
examples: It is a deeply chauvinist community where the few women who have jobs are ridiculed.

body_content.explanation: someone who has an unreasonable belief that their own country or race is the best or most important:
examples: The English tend to be chauvinists - they expect you to sing in their language.
The leaders of Europe deny the legitimacy of this xenophobic chauvinist.

body_content.explanation: someone who believes that or behaves as if women are naturally less important, intelligent, or able than men:
examples: She called him a male chauvinist because of his insistence on calling all women "girls".
They are uneducated chauvinists who think men rule in society.
